title: Arabic 24
text: Transgress not thy limits, nor claim that which beseemeth thee not. Prostrate thyself before the countenance of thy God, the Lord of might and power.

prev.title: Arabic 23
prev.text: To the eternal I call thee, yet thou dost seek that which perisheth. What hath made thee turn away from Our desire and seek thine own?
prev.teaser: To the eternal I call thee...

next.title: Arabic 25
next.text: Vaunt not thyself over the poor, for I lead him on his way and behold thee in thy evil plight and confound thee forevermore.
next.teaser: Vaunt not thyself over the poor...
